title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-5.4 - Reporting, investigation, and confirmation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-5.4 - Reporting, investigation, and confirmation

State Regulations
(a) UST systems. Leaks and
suspected leaks from UST systems must be reported and addressed in accordance
with section
2.4
of this Part, with the
exception of those from ASTs, which must meet the requirements of section 4.4
of this Part. (b) AST
systems. Leaks and suspected leaks from AST systems must be reported
and addressed in accordance with section 4.4 of this Part, with the exception
of those from USTs, which must meet the requirements of section
3.4
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
613-5.4

Adopted, New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 10/11/2015

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
